Name: The Quad
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Four different, orange-flavoured ingredients combine in this complex bittersweet citrusy cocktail.
History: Created in 2010 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of The Quad contains 174 calories
